name: The Relic
description:
Summary:

By grabbing a curious looking amulet, you were transported to an alternate realm.
A world where humans were thought to be extinct.
You wake up to find yourself as the only human in a world run by demons.
Upon meeting a female demon named Serena, she then escorts you to her living quarters where her mysterious family resides.
By making your decisions wisely you will begin to uncover how this world came to be, and why humans and demons were at war, in The Relic.
